official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Postal Service should notify the appropriate authorities in each State of the availability of postal lobbies for the display of voter registration materials.

summary.text: Declares that the House of Representatives supports the continuation of the Postal Service's policy of making postal lobbies available for the display of State voter registration materials. Calls upon the Postal Service to notify States offering mail-in registration of such policy.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Postal Service should notify the appropriate authorities in each State of the availability of postal lobbies for the display of voter registration materials.
